head.supplied: ¶ [From Baron von Mueller, asking if space, for a contribution from him, to the extent of a few pages, could be afforded in the forthcoming part of the Society's Proceedings. The Secretary was reques...

div.p: RSA/A/5 minute book, Royal Society of Tasmania Archives, Hobart.

Letter not found; item is an entry in the minutes of a Council Meeting of the Royal Society of Tasmania held on 13 February 1882, under 'Correspondence recd.'. For the date of M's letter, see J. Barnard to M, 18 February 1882.
[From Baron von Mueller, asking if space, for a contribution from him, to the extent of a few pages, could be afforded in the forthcoming part of the Society's Proceedings. The Secretary was requested to forward an affirmative reply to the Baron.
M's note on the vegetation of King Island, B82.13.14, was, unusually, published without being read at a meeting. ]
